attributes.action: Reduce the points system re. incapacity benefit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Believe that the new assessment for incapacity benefit is too harsh. 
It is not always possible to assess people merely by 'box-ticking'.
Many people are being pushed into impossible situations and debt because the points system is too rigid.
We urge you to consider this problem and realise that too many people are falling through the net.

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
